alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 9:10PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Broward County through 945 PM EDT... At 910 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, or near Sunrise, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pembroke Pines, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Weston, Sawgrass Mills Mall, East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27 and Markham Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County
